mapper.select: SELECT BUY.BUY_CODE , ITEM_NAME , BUY_CNT , TOTAL_PRICE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , BUY_DATE , BUY_PRICE , MEMBER_ID FROM buy_detail DETAIL INNER JOIN shop_item ITEM ON DETAIL.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN item_image IMAGE ON DETAIL.ITEM_CODE = IMAGE.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN shop_buy BUY ON BUY.BUY_CODE = DETAIL.BUY_CODE WHERE IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND BUY.BUY_CODE = #{buyCode} ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC
SELECT ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_STOCK , ITEM_STATUS , CASE WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 1 THEN '준비 중' WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 2 THEN '판매 중' ELSE '매진' END AS STR_STATUS FROM SHOP_ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC

SELECT CATE_NAME , CATE.CATE_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_STOCK , ITEM_STATUS , ITEM.ITEM_CODE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , IS_MAIN , IMG_CODE FROM shop_item ITEM INNER JOIN item_category CATE ON ITEM.CATE_CODE = CATE.CATE_CODE INNER JOIN item_image IMG ON ITEM.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE WHERE ITEM.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}
